term.title: concerted reaction

item.text: A single-step reaction through which reactants are directly transformed into products, i.e., without involvement of any intermediates.

sources.item: PAC, 1999, 71, 1919. 'Glossary of terms used in theoretical organic chemistry' on page 1930 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199971101919)
